title: New: Isabelle Young – Sirens
content:
“A year ago I was a little adrift, so I sat down to write some music.

This was the first song that poured out of me.”

‘Pour’ feels like a very suitable word, for this luxurious debut track from Montreal’s Isabelle Young, lifted from her debut EP expected in May. Sirens begins rather sombre, and blossoms into a gorgeous, deeply emotive number, with Young’s Hannah Reid-esque vocals taking centre stage. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
